abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-user-mobil: Kodai ko a'a wani ma'aikaci yana gyara ta amfani da sigar wayar hannu
mobile-frontend-copyright: Akwai ƙunshiyar a ƙarƙashin $1 har sai an sanar da akasin haka.
mobile-frontend-desc: Yana taimakawa wajen inganta kasancewar wayar hannu ta misali MediaWiki
mobile-frontend-editor-anon: Yi gyara ba tare da kun shiga ba
mobile-frontend-editor-anonwarning: Gargadi: Ba ku shiga ba. Adireshin IP din ku zai zama a bayyane idan kuka yi gyara. Idan ku ka shiga ko kirkira asusu, gyararrakin ku za'a hade su zuwa sunanku, tare da wasu amfani.
mobile-frontend-editor-autocreatewarning: Gargadi: Ba'a shiga asusu ba. Za'a danganta gyaran ku zuwa [[ $1 |sunan da ya aka samu]] ta hanyar ƙara kuki zuwa mazuruftan ku. Adireshin IP ɗin ku zai bayyana ga amintattun masu amfani. Idan ka shiga ko ƙirƙirar asusu, za'a dangana gyare-gyarenku zuwa sunan da kuka zaɓa, tare da wasu fa'idoji.
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-ti: An kulle ku daga yin gyara {{SITENAME}}.
An kulle ku daga yin gyara a wannan shafi.
Adireshin IP din ku an kulle shi daga yin gyara {{SITENAME}}.
Adireshin IP din ku an kulle shi daga gyara a wannan shafin
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-bo: Gwada shiga idan kuna da asusu.
Gwada shiga ciki idan kuna da asusu, ko gwada gyara wani shafi.
Gwada shiga ciki ko kirkirar asusu.
Gwada shiga ciki ko kirkirar asusu, ko gwada gyara wani shafi.
mobile-frontend-editor-cancel-confirm: Shin kuna son kyale gyaran ku?
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled: An kare wannan shafin daga gyara. An kare wannan shafin daga ɓataww [$1 Duba asali]
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled-anon: Yakamata ku shiga zuwa gyara wannan shafi.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-conflict: Kuskure, wani mai'aikaci ya gyara wannan shafi.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-preview: Kuskure, wani abinda da ba'a zata ba yafaru sanda ake kokarin bayyana shafin dubiya. Yi hakuri ku kulle ku sake gwadawa.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing: Ta wallafa sauye sauyen, kun yarda ku bayar da gudunmuwarku karkashin $1 {{PLURAL:$2|lasisi|lasisosi}}.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing-with-te: Ta wallafa sauye sauyen, kun yarda $1 da yarda ku bayar da gudunmuwarku karkashin $2 {{PLURAL:$3|lasisi|lasisosi}}.
mobile-frontend-editor-new-page-confirm: {{GENDER:$1|Kun tabbata kuna son ku ƙirƙira}} sabon shafi a {{SITENAME}}?
mobile-frontend-editor-placeholder: Wannan sashe babu komai. Zama na farko da zai faɗaɗa shi!
mobile-frontend-editor-switch-visual-edi: Canza zuwa yin gyara na gani
mobile-frontend-editor-uploadenable: Ayi hakuri a ɗaura hoto da farko dan bari ayi gyara.
mf-expand-sections-description: A koda yaushe a faɗaɗa sashen shafuka.
mf-font-size-description: Daidaita girman rubutu dan samun daɗin yin karatu.
mobile-frontend-generic-404-desc: Shafin da kuke nema ba'a same shi ba.
mobile-frontend-generic-login-new:
{{SITENAME}} mutane ne kamar ku suke haɗawa.
Kuyi login dan ku bada gudunmawa.
mobile-frontend-languages-structured-ove: Harshen da kuke nema babu shi.
mobile-frontend-last-modified-date: An gyaran ƙarshe a $1, a daidai $2

mobile-frontend-media-load-fail-message: Anyi kuskure sanda ake son ɗauka hoto.
mobile-frontend-search-content: Ku bincika cikin shafukan dake akwai
mobile-frontend-search-content-no-result: {{int:mobile-frontend-search-content}} domin kuga ko akwai abunda kuke nema.
